title: Asian markets rise as investors eye key US jobs, inflation data
description:
Asian markets saw gains as investors await crucial US jobs and inflation data, which will likely influence the Federal Reserve’s upcoming rate decision.

Read More: https://punchng.com/asian-markets-rise-as-investors-eye-key-us-jobs-inflation-data/
content:
Asian markets mostly rose on Wednesday following a resumption of Wall Street’s rally, but gains were muted as investors await the last tranche of US data before next week’s Federal Reserve meeting.
… [+4339 chars]
